### Notice Description

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure the services of a qualified team to develop an enterprise-wide overhead methodology, aligned with legislative and central agency requirements and industry leading practices, for allocating internal service costs to the institution's program activities.

**Duration of Contract**
The contract duration is from contract award to March 31, 2024, plus two (2) options for one-year extensions.

**Evaluation Process and Selection Methodology**
The RFP will be evaluated based on the highest combined ratings of technical merit (70%) and price (30%) submitted by qualified bidders.

**Security Requirements**
Common PS SRCL #6 applies.

**Applicable Trade Agreements**
WTO-AGP, CFTA, CKFTA

Contracting Entity:
The contract will be awarded to a qualified supplier who has been pre-qualified under the PASS supply arrangement no. E60ZQ-180001/D.

**Contact Information**

For inquiries, contact:
France Emond, contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca, (343) 573-0383.

* WTO-AGP, CFTA, CKFTA
* Security Requirements: Common PS SRCL #6
* Clauses apply.
